common_filenames.description: [VM name].vmx - The name of the VMX file is the same name as the VM. For example, the VMX file for a "Windows 8" VM is Windows 8.vmx .
[VM name].vmx - The name of the VMX file is the same name as the VM. For example, the VMX file for a "Windows 8" VM is Windows 8.vmx .
